title: Introducing: Crime Salad
description:
We would love to introduce you to Crime Salad: A True Crime Podcast. Each week, Ashley and Ricky dive in and investigate sudden disappearances, mysterious deaths, unsuspecting massacres, and more. You never know which case they’ll bring up next so always tune in!

https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/crime-salad/id1457141569
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
